markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Olfactory](/Traits.aspx?ID=664)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 459 <sup>2.0</sup>

An olfactory effect can affect only creatures that can smell it. This applies only to olfactory parts of the effect, as determined by the GM.
name: Olfactory
